executable.title: DICOMExport
executable.description: This is a CLI module which creates a DICOM series from the input image with some attributes (patient name,patient ID, study ID and study Instance UID) from another DICOM series.
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NIH grant 3P41RR013218-12S1

directory.name: inputDirectory
directory.description: The input directory of DICOM series.
directory.label: Input DICOM Directory

directory.name: outputDirectory
directory.description: The output directory to contain the DICOM series.
directory.label: Output DICOM Directory
